title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.7 - Reconsideration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.7 - Reconsideration

State Regulations

Any time prior to payment or denial of such claim, the

Secretary of State or his designee may reconsider the determination of any
claim upon the discovery of additional material evidence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
425.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
